value.summary: Across the provided JSON files, the outputs are faithful to the numbered report and practically usable for downstream review. Quantitative values (62.3% vs 37.3%; 40.6% vs 20.6%; p=0.01; IFN score 3.1 vs 1.0; PD-L1 2.4x; CD8 density 1.8x) exactly match the report’s quantitative table (L28–L33) and are not embellished. Core study design elements (preclinical murine models + translational retrospective human cohort) are correctly represented (L14–L16), cohort sizes are correct (L19–L23), and main,
